datasets.name: NSIDC SMMR-SSM/I Nasateam sea ice concentration
datasets.description: Passive-microwave estimates of sea ice concentration at 25km spatial resolution. Daily and monthly resolution, available from 1-Oct-1978 to present.

datasets.name: NSIDC SMMR-SSM/I Nasateam near-real-time sea ice concentration
datasets.description: Passive-microwave estimates of sea ice concentration at 25km, daily, near-real-time resolution.

datasets.name: NSIDC passive microwave supporting files
datasets.description: Grids and other support files for NSIDC passive-microwave sea ice data.

datasets.name: Nimbus Ice Edge Points from Nimbus Visible Imagery
datasets.description: This data set (NmIcEdg2) estimates the location of the North and South Pole sea ice edges at various times during the mid to late 1960s, based on recovered Nimbus 1 (1964), Nimbus 2 (1966), and Nimbus 3 (1969) visible imagery.

datasets.name: Artist AMSR-E passive microwave sea ice concentration
datasets.description: Passive-microwave estimates of daily sea ice concentration at 6.25km spatial resolution, from 19-Jun-2002 to 2-Oct-2011.

datasets.name: Artist AMSR-E passive microwave supporting files
datasets.description: Grids and other support files for Artist AMSR-E passive-microwave sea ice data.

datasets.name: Artist AMSR2 near-real-time passive microwave sea ice concentration
datasets.description: Near-real-time passive-microwave estimates of daily sea ice concentration at 6.25km spatial resolution, from 24-July-2012 to present.

datasets.name: Artist AMSR2 passive microwave supporting files
datasets.description: Grids for Artist AMSR2 passive-microwave sea ice data.

datasets.name: CERSAT SSM/I sea ice concentration
datasets.description: Passive microwave sea ice concentration data at 12.5km resolution, 3-Dec-1991 to present

datasets.name: Smith and Sandwell bathymetry
datasets.description: Global seafloor topography from satellite altimetry and ship depth soundings

datasets.name: NOAA Optimum Interpolation 1/4 Degree Daily Sea Surface Temperature Analysis
datasets.description: Sea surface temperature at 0.25 degree daily resolution, from 1-Sep-1981 to present

datasets.name: Ssalto/Duacs gridded absolute dynamic topography
datasets.description: Gridded sea surface heights above geoid from satellite altimetry

datasets.name: Ssalto/Duacs gridded absolute geostrophic velocities
datasets.description: Absolute geostrophic velocities computed from gridded sea surface heights above geoid from satellite altimetry

datasets.name: Ssalto/Duacs gridded sea level anomalies
datasets.description: Gridded sea surface height anomalies from satellite altimetry

datasets.name: Ssalto/Duacs gridded mean and climatological sea level anomalies
datasets.description: Monthly mean and monthly climatologies of gridded sea surface height anomalies from satellite altimetry

datasets.name: GSHHG coastline data
datasets.description: A Global Self-consistent, Hierarchical, High-resolution Geography Database

datasets.name: Polar environmental data layers
datasets.description: These layers are climatological and other summary layers that may be useful for purposes such as general modelling, regionalisation, and exploratory analyses

datasets.name: Oceandata MODIS Aqua Level-3 binned daily remote sensing reflectance
datasets.description: Daily remote-sensing reflectance from MODIS Aqua. RRS is used to produce standard ocean colour products such as chlorophyll concentration

datasets.name: Oceandata SeaWiFS Level-3 binned daily remote sensing reflectance
datasets.description: Daily remote-sensing reflectance from SeaWiFS. RRS is used to produce standard ocean colour products such as chlorophyll concentration
